name: BORE DOME (itch)
description:
BORE DOME is an experimental first person simulation game that lets you experience the mediocrity and imperfection of the 21st century using “cutting-edge psychotronic medication”.

Enable your thought and will, equip your senses and get ready to confront all kinds of situations and unhinged characters.

 "In the near future, human life is perfect. BORE DOME is a magical pill solution of the future, consumed as entertainment and medicine, providing humans with moments of imperfection and mediocrity - something exotic, distant and extinct."
